content: Phase 1: POC - Create test_core.py for email (SendGrid/SMTP) and file storage testing
Phase 1: POC - Run test_core.py and fix until all tests pass
Phase 1: All POC user stories verified and working
Phase 2: Get design guidelines from design_agent
Phase 2: Backend Implementation - Models, APIs, Auth, File Upload
Phase 2: Frontend Implementation - All pages with institutional design
Phase 2: All user stories covered in Development and testing
Phase 2: End to End Testing using Testing Agent
Phase 3: Fix all bugs found during testing
